about_the_game:
Wine & War is a virtual SLG + tower defense battle game with the alternate history as the background. It achieves the hegemony of the unity of the world by upgrading cities, building appropriate buildings, upgrading arms and training generals.The demo version can only select Shu, and can play for 2 years in the game.

the evolution of arms and their mutual control [/]
Two soldiers of the same level and class can obtain higher-level and higher-level soldiers through synthesis. At present, the third level is the top arms. In addition, Wei, Shu and Wu have their own level 3 and level 9 arms.
There is a relationship between the arms, the archers against the cavalry, the cavalry against the infantry, and the infantry against the archers.

48 special generals [/]
The game includes 48 generals. Different generals and strategists have different characteristics. Command them to attack the city and pull out the stronghold.

combined playing method of generals [/]
Each general has his own fixed combination. If the combined generals are sent to fight together, the skills of the generals / strategists will change.
